meanings.definition: The action or process of making something normal or standard again.
meanings.sent1: After the chaos, the renormalizations of the schedule helped bring order back.
meanings.sent2: The renormalizations of the temperature control system restored comfort to the room.
meanings.sent3: The renormalizations of the messy desk made it look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence acted as a renormalizations in the hectic office environment.
meanings.sent5: The renormalizations of the painting transformed it from chaotic to harmonious.

meanings.definition: The act of adjusting or modifying something to bring it back to a normal state.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic's renormalizations of the engine fixed the car's performance issues.
meanings.sent2: She made renormalizations to the recipe to make it taste just right.
meanings.sent3: The renormalizations of the crooked picture frame made it hang straight.
meanings.sent4: His advice served as a renormalizations for her troubled thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The renormalizations of the clock's time brought everything back on track.
